product_name: Ultimate Direction Access 20 Plus Hydration Waistpack
long_description: The Access 20 Plus Hydration Waistpack from Ultimate Direction gives you an easy-access 20 oz. sports bottle, zip cellphone pocket, and optional gel flask and accessory pocket for a great run. Wicking mesh next to skin is lightweight and breathable for comfort. Angled, semi-flexible cage with flared top lets you grab and replace your bottle easily on the move. 20 oz. BPA-free bottle features the innovative Kicker Valve, offset for easier drinking; has an easy-grip leakproof sealing cap, and textured finger and thumb grooves. Textured backing in bottle cage adds a friction fit. Removable accessory pocket near the front buckle and removable gel flask let you customize your run. Smartphone-compatible zippered pocket also holds food and valuables. Bungee can stow a pair of lightweight gloves. Ultimate Direction Access 20 Plus Hydration Waistpack has a belt with elastic keepers that fits waists/hips ranging from 14 to 45 in.
short_description: The Access 20 Plus Hydration Waistpack from Ultimate Direction gives you an easy-access 20 oz. sports bottle, zip cellphone pocket, and optional gel flask and accessory pocket for a great run.
